Package net.sf.freecol.common.model.pathfinding

Class GoalDeciders

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.freecol.common.model.pathfinding.GoalDeciders

  • public final class GoalDeciders
extends java.lang.Object
    Handy library of GoalDeciders.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  GoalDeciders.MultipleAdjacentDecider
      A class to wrap a goal decider that searches for paths to an adjacent tile to a set of locations, and the results of such a search.

    • Method Detail

      • getComposedGoalDecider

        public static GoalDecider getComposedGoalDecider​(boolean all,
                                                 GoalDecider... gds)
        Gets a composite goal decider composed of two or more individual goal deciders. The first one dominates the second etc.
        Parameters:
        all - If true, all deciders must succeed (and-semantics), if false, any decide may succeed (or-semantics).
        gds - A series (two minimum) of GoalDeciders to compose.
        Returns:
        A new GoalDecider composed of the argument goal deciders.

      • getOurClosestSettlementGoalDecider

        public static GoalDecider getOurClosestSettlementGoalDecider​()
        Gets a GoalDecider to find the `closest' settlement owned by the searching unit player, with connected ports weighted double.
        Returns:
        The closest settlement goal decider.

      • getHighSeasGoalDecider

        public static GoalDecider getHighSeasGoalDecider​()
        Gets a GoalDecider to find the closest high seas tile to a target. Used when arriving on the map from Europe.
        Returns:
        The high seas goal decider.

      • getSimpleHighSeasGoalDecider

        public static GoalDecider getSimpleHighSeasGoalDecider​()
        Build a simple goal decider to find the first high seas tile without using the unit parameter.
        Returns:
        A GoalDecider that finds the nearest high seas tile.

      • getLocationGoalDecider

        public static GoalDecider getLocationGoalDecider​(Location target)
        Builds a simple goal decider to find a single target location.
        Parameters:
        target - The target Location.
        Returns:
        A GoalDecider that only succeeds for the target location.

      • getAdjacentLocationGoalDecider

        public static GoalDecider getAdjacentLocationGoalDecider​(Location target)
        Builds a goal decider to find an adjacent tile to a target location.
        Parameters:
        target - The target Location.
        Returns:
        A GoalDecider that only succeeds for tiles adjacent to the target location.

      • getEnemySettlementGoalDecider

        public static GoalDecider getEnemySettlementGoalDecider​(java.util.Collection<Player> enemies)
        Get a goal decider that succeeds for settlements owned by one of a given list of enemies.
        Parameters:
        enemies - The list of enemy Players.
        Returns:
        A suitable GoalDecider.

      • getDisembarkGoalDecider

        public static GoalDecider getDisembarkGoalDecider​(Tile target)
        Goal decider to find the best land tile to disembark a unit that is planning to attack a given target. The result must be: - Unoccupied - Have at least one unoccupied high-seas-connected neighbour - Favour the best natural defence of the alternatives - Favour a short journey to the target - Prioritize not landing next to a hostile fort/fortress.
        Parameters:
        target - The target Tile.
        Returns:
        A suitable GoalDecider.

      • getStealthyGoalDecider

        public static GoalDecider getStealthyGoalDecider​(Player enemy)
        Get a goal decider to find tiles that an enemy player can not see.
        Parameters:
        enemy - The enemy Player to avoid.
        Returns:
        A suitable GoalDecider.

      • getReduceHighSeasCountGoalDecider

        public static GoalDecider getReduceHighSeasCountGoalDecider​(Unit unit)
        Get a goal decider to find tiles with a settlement with a lower high seas count than a unit currently has. Useful for tunnelling out of intermittantly blocked rivers.
        Parameters:
        unit - The Unit to get the goal decider for.
        Returns:
        A suitable GoalDecider.

      • getCornerGoalDecider

        public static GoalDecider getCornerGoalDecider​()
        Get a goal decider to find tiles on river corners, preferring ones closest to the high seas. This is useful when a unit is stuck on a river. By moving to a corner (i.e. where another unit can get past it) the chance that the blockage clears is enhanced.
        Returns:
        A suitable goal decider.
